column1:
ã€Day 1 - Hometownã€‘
Cat opened a treasure chest
to find 5 Speed Ups!

ã€Day 2 - Hometownã€‘
Cat looked into a jar
and found 4 Rich Cats!

ã€Day 3 - Hometownã€‘
Cat received 1 Rare Ticket
from an old friend!

ã€Day 4 - Hometownã€‘
Cat opened a dresser
to find 4 Cat CPUs!

ã€Day 5 - Hometownã€‘
Cat was gifted 2 Cat Tickets
from a castle guard!

ã€Day 6 - Small Caveã€‘
Cat opened a treasure chest
and found 1 Rare Ticket!

ã€Day 7 - Small Caveã€‘
Cat found 1 Treasure Radar
in a crevice in the wall!

ã€Day 8 - Small Caveã€‘
Cat ventured deeper into the cave
and discovered 5 Sniper the Cats!

ã€Day 9 - Volcanoã€‘
Cat received 1 Rare Ticket
from some passing adventurers!

ã€Day 10 - Volcanoã€‘
Cat was gifted 3 Cat Tickets
from an old friend!

ã€Day 11 - Volcanoã€‘
Cat opened a chest buried
at the summit and found 4 Cat Jobs!

ã€Day 12 - Innã€‘
Cat opened a dresser
to discover 1 Rare Ticket!

ã€Day 13 - Innã€‘
Cat found 3 Rich Cats
hidden at a save point!

ã€Day 14 - Desertã€‘
Cat dug deep in the sand
and found 3 Cat CPUs!

ã€Day 15 - Desertã€‘
A contact lens glints in the sand...
right next to a Rare Ticket!

ã€Day 16 - Desertã€‘
Cat found 1 Treasure Radar
by the waters of an oasis.

ã€Day 17 - Large Bridgeã€‘
Cat found 3 Cat Jobs at
the foot of the bridge to the island!

ã€Day 18 - Large Bridgeã€‘
Cat found a bird's nest with
a Rare Ticket hidden inside!

ã€Day 19 - Kokorika Villageã€‘
Cat was gifted 5 Speed Ups
from the village headman!

ã€Day 20 - Throne Roomã€‘
Cat was paid 3 Cat Tickets
for their services to the King!

ã€Day 21 - Throne Roomã€‘
Cat was gifted a Rare Ticket
from the royal vizier!

ã€Day 22 - Prisonã€‘
Cat was thrown in the dungeon
and found 3 Cat Jobs in their cell!

ã€Day 23 - Prisonã€‘
Cat came across 3 Rich Cats
next to a pile of bones!

ã€Day 24 - Prisonã€‘
Cat found the dungeon key
hidden underneath a Rare Ticket!

ã€Day 25 - Snowy Mountainã€‘
Cat found 2 Cat Tickets
buried in the snow.

ã€Day 26 - Snowy Mountainã€‘
Cat found 1 Treasure Radar
stuck inside a snowman!

ã€Day 27 - Snowy Mountainã€‘
Cat found 1 Rare Ticket during
their 11th time fleeing from battle!

ã€Day 28 - Forest Mazeã€‘
Cat discovered an ocarina
alongside 3 Cat CPUs!

ã€Day 29 - Forest Mazeã€‘
Cat searched the fallen leaves
and found 5 Sniper Cats!

ã€Day 30 - Forest Exitã€‘
Cat met a wood nymph
who gave them 1 Rare Ticket!
